sku01.title: Player Unknown Battlegrounds
sku01.description: A battle royale shooter that puts 100 players against each other in a struggle for survival.

sku02.title: Arma III
sku02.description: Experience true combat gameplay in a massive military sandbox.

sku03.title: Squad
sku03.description: Squad is a 50 vs 50 multiplayer first-person shooter that aims to capture combat realism through communication and teamplay.

sku04.title: Insurgency
sku04.description: Take to the streets for intense close quarters combat, where a team's survival depends upon securing crucial strongholds and destroying enemy supply in this multiplayer and cooperative Source Engine based experience.
